views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 9

On iOS 9? Try

Noctis is a stunning dark mode for iOS 9. Noctis has 3 levels of darkness to choose from, light, medium and dark. You can also add your own custom color tint.

It affects the following:

1. Control Center
2. Folders
3. Dock
4. 3D touch menus
5. Volume HUD

It is work with iPad and iPhone and is compatible with Auto LE, FlipControlCenter and most other control center tweaks.

Configure Noctis9 via settings.

This item is now Free. Fixed white text on 3D touch menus 1.8:
- Fixes loop issues experienced on some devices.
- Removes 3D touch menu effect and toggle next to slider.
- Syncs with Do Not Disturb toggle to toggle Noctis off and on. If flipswitch is not installed.
- Added FlipSwitch compatible with FlipCC and Polus.
